column4:
♪Shalaka!♪


It's you! We meet again!


What's with the silent treatment?
Don't you remember me? I'm the
musician of Korok Forest, Hestu!
I'm impressed you found your way
through the Lost Woods and made it
here...
So have you brought me any
Korok seeds?

そのコログのミくれたら
お礼にポーチ大きくしたげるけど どう？

If you'll return my lost Korok seeds to
me, I'll expand the size of your inventory.
Which stash do you want another slot in?
